ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors gratefully acknowledge the support of the Worldwide Insecticide Resistance Network (WIN) as well as the contributions of all of the conference speakers, rapporteurs and participants. The authors thank the WHO-TDR (Dr Florence Fouque), WHO-NTD (Dr Raman Velayudhan), IRD, Montpellier University of Excellence (MUSE), CNRS and other private sponsors for their participation and contribution to the conference.
